translation.Message_0_Page_0: Three main traders: Red, Architect and Huey will offer you five quests each. You can track your quest progress with this fancy board behind me!
translation.Message_0_Page_1: Each quest unlocks new items for sale, new barter offers or other benefits.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: Traders purchase different items or sell others, but they also have barter offers which allow you to exchange goods you find around.
